name: Verify Date and Reason are mandatory fields for Comp Off

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Date and Reason are mandatory fields for Comp Off ({parentTab=Leave Management, childTab=Apply, tab=Comp Off, heading=Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "Apply" sub tab of "Leave Management" tab
And Verify "Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request" of "Apply" tab
When User clicks on "Comp Off" Tab
When User clicks on Submit button for Comp off Tab
Then Verify "Comp Off Reason" text box is mandatory field
Then Verify "Comp Off Date" dropdown is mandatory field

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Apply module of MIS Beta

title: Verify Date and Reason are mandatory fields for Comp Off

values: Apply Leave / WFH / Comp Off / Out Duty / Change Request
